original_title: Veteran singer Tony Hassan passes away
original_body_lines: Veteran singer Tony Hassan passed away at the age of 73, family sources said.
He rose to popularity with his renditions of Hindi songs over a span of five decades. To his credit are several original Sinhala songs including a duet with late veteran singer Sujatha Aththanayaka.
According to family sources, the final rites will be held at the Maligawatta Muslim Burial Ground this evening.
